page.title: 02Wimbish Farm Names
page.content: The farms are run by 12 families,many of the old farm names being retained. The list below only has the names of farms actually in the 12sq.km.area. {NAME OF FARM FAMILY Newhouse,Rowney...........{Cargill} Aldridges,Hodges,Joyces, Little Stonards,Stonnards.{Chapman Bears Hall,Cole End,Tiptofts Thunderley Parsonage......{Haigh Braggs,BurntHouse,Freemans{Hare Pepples...................{Hawkins Garretts,Maypole..........{Hembry Broad Oaks Manor..........{McLeod Georges,Wimbish Hall......{Padfield Gunters,Thunderley Hall...{Plumb Lower House...............{Stock Brick House,Ricketts......{Tetlow Elms,Gowers,Parsonage, { Pinkneys Manor,Westleys...{Wiseman
